Pre-Game Insights: Hornets are without Mark Williams and Nick Richards due to injury, which leaves the paint to be guarded by Taj Gibson and Grant Williams.
Hornets allow the 5th most points to Centers and the 7th most points in the paint.
LaMelo Ball has exceeded 31.5 points and assists in 71% of games this season and is averaging 34.3 points and assists.
LaMelo Ball saw his assists decline after 3 games against the Celtics and Timberwolves, two of the best defensive teams in the league.
